WorkItem.Description: Get hold of typescriptServices.d.ts and find FormattingOptions. See that it doesn't reside in the TypeScript module but is a global symbol. That seems a little odd and makes it harder when typescriptServices are consumed in an AMD environment.
WorkItem.Summary: FormattingOptions are declared outside TypeScript module
